HPI 8609 Nissan Skyline GT-R 1993 Mine (JTC Round 1) 2nd place M. Hasemi/H. Fukuyama



Masahiro Hasemi and Hideo Fukuyama drove this Skyline in the 1993 JTC season opener at Mine Circuit in Yamaguci, Japan. They qualified in 4th place and finished in second. Hasemi & Fukuyama finished the series in 7th & 8th places.
